member.name: MS_ADDINFO_BLOB
member.summary: The MS_ADDINFO_BLOB structure provides additional information for in-memory BLOB subject types.

member.name: MS_ADDINFO_BLOB.cbStruct
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: MS_ADDINFO_BLOB.cbMemObject
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the data in the pbMemObject member.

member.name: MS_ADDINFO_BLOB.pbMemObject
member.summary: A pointer to the in-memory BLOB subject.

member.name: MS_ADDINFO_BLOB.cbMemSignedMsg
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the data in the pbMemSignedMsg member.

member.name: MS_ADDINFO_BLOB.pbMemSignedMsg
member.summary: A pointer to the signed message.
